name: A Pill's Life
description:
This is the story of the life of a pill. It is a very short story, and it is not a very interesting one, and it is quite pathetic. The game can be completed in a few minutes and was made slowly across a couple of weeks.

CONTROLS

The game is a short first-person walking simulator played with keyboard and mouse.

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Left Click - Interact
  • F - Fullscreen
  • that's it
CREDITS
  • Made using First Person Starter by Whimfoome, MIT, via Godot's Asset Library
  • Medicine/Pill Models by Elegant Crow, CC BY-SA 4.0, via OpenGameArt
  • Kitchen and Food Models by Kenney, CC0, via kenney.nl
  • Menu Song - Down in the Basement by Holizna, CC0, via Free Music Archive
  • Kitchen Song - Hardd Vakuum Remix by Ov Moi Omm, CC BY 4.0, via FMA
  • Horror SFX by TinyWorlds, CC0, via Open Game Art
DEVELOPED BY FREE FOOD STUDIOS
